data.short_description: This DLC contains 3 skins. Plunder some dungeons with elegance! Skins Pack: Melinda, Anemhutep, Elvire
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Simplified Chinese*, Japanese*, Russian*, Italian*, Spanish - Spain*, Portuguese*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Ukrainian*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista
  • Processor: 1,3 GHz CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 440 or AMD Radeon HD 5550 w/ 512 MB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 7
  • Processor: Dual-core 2Ghz CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX® 10 compliant graphics card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.8.5
  • Processor: 1,3 GHz CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X 10.9.1
  • Processor: Dual-core 2Ghz CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Pro, NVIDIA GTX 660 Ti, or AMD Radeon HD 7870 w/ 1024 MB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: 1,3 GHz CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card: DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+, SteamOS+
  • Processor: Dual-core 2Ghz CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card: DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

data.legal_notice:
Game developed and published by Goblinz Studio SAS (France).

The chinese version is published by WhisperGames in all regions of China, Taiwan,Macao, Hongkong...
